curam.common.util.xml.dom

Class DocumentFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.common.util.xml.dom.Content
      • curam.common.util.xml.dom.DocumentFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DomWrapper

    public class DocumentFragment
extends Content
    A DocumentFragment defines a minimal XML document that has no parent. This implementation wraps a dom4j Element, as dom4j itself does not support DocumentFragments.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DocumentFragment()
      Constructor which takes a string element name.
      DocumentFragment(org.dom4j.Element element)
      Constructor which takes a dom4j Document.
